name: Bug Saves The World
description:
You are the last bug left on planet Earth, the only way to make it out alive is by collecting all the secret tokens hidden throughout each level while avoiding hostile monsters. Sounds easy enough right? :)

The map will feature terrains meant to test your skills as a bug. There are patches of fire around the map that will turn the bug a tint of red and result in a game over.  Collect all the stars scattered throughout the map to complete each level.
